messages.title: Frank Doran Backs Richard Baker
messages.content: Frank shares his best wishes to Richard for a successful campaign.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Richard pledges to deliver a powerhouse Scottish parliament.
Commitment to NHS funding and integration of health and social care.
Focus on revitalising local high street and small businesses.
Plans to ensure young people in the area can afford homes.
Commitment to local jobs in renewable and traditional energy sectors.

issues.economy: Richard pledges to deliver a powerhouse Scottish parliament.
issues.environment: Commitment to local jobs in renewable and traditional energy sectors.
issues.health: Commitment to NHS funding and integration of health and social care.

housing.content: Plans to ensure young people in the area can afford homes.

contactInformation.address: Aberdeen Labour Party, 78 Rosemount Place, Aberdeen, AB25 2XN

endorsements.endorsement: Shares his best wishes to Richard for a successful campaign.

images.caption: Richard campaigning for better local services and facilities.
Richard with supporters Frank Doran and Jenny Laing.
Richard's campaign engagement with young voters.
